Powder Keg.name: Powder Keg
Powder Keg.effect: Battle Start: If you only have 1 bomb item equipped, it triggers 3 times

Royal Helmet.name: Royal Helmet
Royal Helmet.effect: Exposed: If you have more than 20 gold, gain 10 armor

Sanguine Rose.name: Sanguine Rose
Sanguine Rose.effect: Whenever you restore health, increase health restored by 1. You can only equip 1 rose

Thorn Ring.name: Thorn Ring
Thorn Ring.effect: Battle Start: Take 5 damage and gain 10 thorns

Vampire's Tooth.name: Vampire's Tooth
Vampire's Tooth.effect: If you have exactly 1 sanguine item, double its healing

Featherweight Helmet.name: Featherweight Helmet
Featherweight Helmet.effect: Battle start: Spend 2 armor to gain 3 speed and 1 attack

Frostbite Armor.name: Frostbite Armor
Frostbite Armor.effect: The enemy's first strike deals double damage, afterwards they gain 4 freeze

Frostbite Greaves.name: Frostbite Greaves
Frostbite Greaves.effect: Whenever you lose speed, give the enemy 1 freeze

Assault Greaves.name: Assault Greaves
Assault Greaves.effect: Whenever you take damage, deal 1 damage

Blackbriar Armor.name: Blackbriar Armor
Blackbriar Armor.effect: Whenever you take damage, gain 1 thorns

Brittlebark Armor.name: Brittlebark Armor
Brittlebark Armor.effect: Whenever you take damage, take 1 additional damage

Cactus Cap.name: Cactus Cap
Cactus Cap.effect: If the enemy has no armor, thorns deal double damage

Crimson Cloak.name: Crimson Cloak
Crimson Cloak.effect: Whenever you take damage, restore 1 health

Druid's Cloak.name: Druid's Cloak
Druid's Cloak.effect: Whenever you lose health, gain that much armor. You cannot restore health

Iron Transfusion.name: Iron Transfusion
Iron Transfusion.effect: Turn Start: Gain 2 armor and lose 1 health

Ironskin Potion.name: Ironskin Potion
Ironskin Potion.effect: Battle Start: Gain armor equal to lost health

Ironstone Armor.name: Ironstone Armor
Ironstone Armor.effect: Enemy strikes deal 2 damage less while you have armor

Lifeblood Armor.name: Lifeblood Armor
Lifeblood Armor.effect: Battle Start: Convert 50% of your current health to that amount of armor

Moonlight Shield.name: Moonlight Shield
Moonlight Shield.effect: Turn Start: If you're below 50% health, gain 2 armor

Razor Breastplate.name: Razor Breastplate
Razor Breastplate.effect: Wounded: Gain thorns equal to enemy attack

Royal Shield.name: Royal Shield
Royal Shield.effect: Turn Start: Convert 1 gold to 3 armor

Shield Talisman.name: Shield Talisman
Shield Talisman.effect: Whenever you gain armor, gain 1 additional armor

Swiftstrike Cloak.name: Swiftstrike Cloak
Swiftstrike Cloak.effect: Battle Start: If you have more speed than the enemy, gain 1 additional strike

Sword Talisman.name: Sword Talisman
Sword Talisman.effect: Whenever you deal non-weapon damage to the enemy, deal 1 additional damage

Time Bomb.name: Time Bomb
Time Bomb.effect: Exposed: Deal 1 damage. Turn start: This item gains 2 damage

Bloodmoon Armor.name: Bloodmoon Armor
Bloodmoon Armor.effect: Whenever you would take damage from your own items, the enemy takes that damage instead

Cold Resistance.name: Cold Resistance
Cold Resistance.effect: Freeze doubles your attack instead of halving it

Granite Thorns.name: Granite Thorns
Granite Thorns.effect: You don't lose any thorns on the enemy's first 3 strikes

Razor Scales.name: Razor Scales
Razor Scales.effect: Whenever you lose armor, deal that much damage

Chainlink Medallion.name: Chainlink Medallion
Chainlink Medallion.effect: Your On Hit effects trigger twice

Citrine Earring.name: Citrine Earring
Citrine Earring.effect: Gain 1 speed every other turn — at Gold: 2 , at Diamond: 4

Emerald Earring.name: Emerald Earring
Emerald Earring.effect: Restore 1 health every other turn — at Gold: 2 , at Diamond: 4

Ruby Earring.name: Ruby Earring
Ruby Earring.effect: Deal 1 damage every other turn — at Gold: deal 2 , at Diamond: deal 4

Sapphire Earring.name: Sapphire Earring
Sapphire Earring.effect: Gain 1 armor every other turn — at Gold: 2 , at Diamond: 4

Emerald Ring.name: Emerald Ring
Emerald Ring.effect: Battle Start: Restore 3 health — at Gold: 6 , at Diamond: 12

Ruby Ring.name: Ruby Ring
Ruby Ring.effect: Battle Start: Gain 2 attack and take 3 damage — at Gold: take 6 for 4, at Diamond: take 12 for 8

Sapphire Ring.name: Sapphire Ring
Sapphire Ring.effect: Battle Start: Steal 2 from the enemy — at Gold: 4 , at Diamond: 8

Citrine Ring.name: Citrine Ring
Citrine Ring.effect: Battle Start: Spend 5 speed to permanently gain 1 additional strike

Citrine Gemstone.name: Citrine Gemstone
Citrine Gemstone.effect: Your base speed stat is inverted

Emerald Gemstone.name: Emerald Gemstone
Emerald Gemstone.effect: Battle Start: If you have less max health than the enemy, set your max health equal to their max health

Ruby Gemstone.name: Ruby Gemstone
Ruby Gemstone.effect: If your attack is exactly 1, deal 4 damage on hit

Sapphire Gemstone.name: Sapphire Gemstone
Sapphire Gemstone.effect: Whenever you lose armor, restore that much health

Spiny Chestnut.name: Spiny Chestnut
Spiny Chestnut.effect: Battle Start: Gain 3 thorns and thorns do double damage

Stone Steak.name: Stone Steak
Stone Steak.effect: Battle Start: Gain 15 armor, if health is full gain another 15 armor

Trail Mix.name: Trail Mix
Trail Mix.region: Battle Start: Deal 1 damage and gain 1 thorns. Repeat 2 times.

Cherry Cocktail.name: Cherry Cocktail
Cherry Cocktail.region: Battle Start & Wounded: Deal 3 damage and restore 3 health

Granite Cherry.name: Granite Cherry
Granite Cherry.region: Battle Start: If your health is full, gain 2 armor and deal 2 damage. Repeat 2 times

Spiked Wine.name: Spiked Wine
Spiked Wine.region: Wounded: Restore 5 health and gain 5 thorns

Petrified Chestnut.name: Petrified Chestnut
Petrified Chestnut.region: Battle Start: If your health is full, gain 6 thorns and 6 armor

Candied Nuts.name: Candied Nuts
Candied Nuts.region: Battle Start: Gain 3 thorns. Thorns deal double damage

Bloody Steak.name: Bloody Steak
Bloody Steak.region: Wounded: Restore 10 health and gain 5 armor

Rock Candy.name: Rock Candy
Rock Candy.region: Battle start: Gain 15 armor. If your health is full, gain an additional 15 armor
